thumb.title: 【低音ボイス原曲キーで歌う】DECO*27 - モニタリング | Cover by グ /g/
thumb.description: 一発撮りでPCで録音してみましたー 恋愛感情に溺れ相手に尽くすことでしか愛を得られないと思い込まないで、大事にしてくれる人は見過ごしがちなところにいてるからI recorded it in one take on my PC! Don’t think that the only way to receive love is by drowning in romantic feelings and devoting yourself completely. The ones who truly cherish you are often in places you tend to overlook.【Playlist】 Cover songs by グ /g/ https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLh9WyskYK_xlphRLn_DpK1pugPTxO_Crd【Link】Pokekara https://u.pokekara.com/mv/1899763328507834368X https://x.com/grphclマシュマロ https://marshmallow-qa.com/2r5aw0fkc7oblpu【Best】【低音ボイス原曲キーで歌う】DECO*27 - モニタリング | Cover by グ /g/ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_v4zVsgxBn8Omoinotake - 幾億光年 | Cover by グ /ɡ/ on Pokekara https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OilxmLQHNOIEd Sheeran - Shape of You | Cover by グ /g/ on Pokekara https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8wfQXNaAHs8BTS(방탄소년단) - Dynamite(다이너마이트) | Cover by グ /g/ on Pokekara https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HPeeR_X5sig
thumb.last_res_body: 歌声好きです！ ひくっ！ うぽつ

tags.tag: ボカロオリジナルを歌ってみた
